item.title: Third UK–Saudi Arabia aid dialogue: Stronger ties and global impact
item.description: The UK and Saudi Arabia have agreed on new projects in Yemen and Bangladesh, and they pledged deeper cooperation on aid delivery, financing and global reforms. The UK and Saudi Arabia hosted their two-day-long third Strategic Dialogue on international development and humanitarian assistance beginn

item.title: Trendy outfits shape fashion this winter
item.description: The winter shopping season has started early this year. Young people are already out in the markets in search of new looks for the colder days. Many shops in Dhaka report a rise in customers from mid-November. The rush is more pronounced in popular youth zones like Noor Jahan Market, New Market, an

item.title: Against the odds, Bangladeshi female e-gamers claim their space in e-sports
item.description: "Women are not good with technology, let alone gaming. Gaming is for 'boys' only."- A common phrase to strike against younger girls who want to play online games. Since the advent of Artificial Intelligence, we have gone beyond many of its uses. Recently, people have been pursuing e-gaming as a car

item.title: Seven terrorists killed in NW Pakistan
item.description: Seven terrorists were killed during intelligence-based operations in Pakistan's northwest Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, the military said on Tuesday. The security forces conducted the operations in two different areas of the North Waziristan district of the province, the Inter-Services Public Relat

item.title: Malaysia says search for flight MH370 to resume in Dec
item.description: The search for Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 will resume on December 30, the Transport Ministry said on Wednesday. Exploration firm Ocean Infinity will recommence seabed search operations intermittently for a total of 55 days, the ministry said in a statement. "The search will be carried out in

item.title: LaLiga leaders Barcelona fight back to beat Atletico 3-1
item.description: Barcelona recovered to secure a 3-1 win over Atletico Madrid as goals from Raphinha, Dani Olmo and Ferran Torres handed the visitors their first LaLiga defeat since August and extended the champions' lead at the top after an intense clash on Tuesday. The result puts Barca on 37 points, four ahead

item.title: Dhaka Central Jail prisoner dies
item.description: A 75-year-old prisoner died after falling sick at Dhaka Central Jail on Tuesday night, the authorities said. The deceased was identified as Abdul Matin, son of late Mirjan Ali. Details about him are yet to be known, UNB reports. Prison officer Mirza Harun said Matin suddenly felt sick at night, p

item.title: UK specialist Richard Beale arrives in Dhaka to assist in Khaleda’s treatment
item.description: Dr Richard Beale, a leading medical specialist from the United Kingdom, has arrived in Dhaka to assist with the treatment of BNP Chairperson and former prime minister Khaleda Zia. Dr Beale, who heads a team of foreign medical experts, landed in Dhaka around 10:30 am on Wednesday and went straight

item.title: Trump administration halts immigration applications for migrants from 19 travel-ban nations
item.description: The Trump administration is pausing all immigration applications such as requests for green cards for people from 19 countries banned from travel earlier this year, as part of sweeping immigration changes in the wake of the shooting of two National Guard troops. The changes were outlined in a poli

item.title: Teachers announce 'complete shutdown' of primary schools
item.description: Government primary school teachers in Bangladesh have announced a nationwide “complete shutdown” from Wednesday as part of their ongoing protest over pay and promotion demands. The Primary Teachers’ Demand Implementation Council, which is leading the movement, made the announceme

item.title: Tetulia continues to witness lowest temperature
item.description: Tetulia continued to record the lowest temperature of the day at 11.1 degrees Celsius on Wednesday, while the Bangladesh Meteorological Department (BMD) has forecast generally dry weather with temporarily partly cloudy skies over most parts of the country during the next 24 hours, beginning at 9:00

item.title: New-look Tk 500 banknote set to hit the market
item.description: Bangladesh Bank is releasing a new design for the Tk 500 note in the market.
